text: He even tried to desecrate the temple, so we seized 24:6-8 him. 8 By 55.3% ¦ him and wanted to judge him according to our own law. 7 But Lysias the commander came and took him out of our hands with much violence, 8 ordering his accusers to come before yoʋ. By BYZ {9.3%} BYZ {5.7%} ANT TR {1%} [Note: There are two separate BYZ readings that have the same English translation.]him.
